# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O common-tosca-inventory-1.0.0-linux64.tar.gz https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1086/org/openo/common-tosca/inventory/standalone/1.0.0/standalone-1.0.0-linux64.tar.gz && tar -xf common-tosca-inventory-1.0.0-linux64.tar.gz && rm -f common-tosca-inventory-1.0.0-linux64.tar.gz
EXPOSE 8203
EXPOSE 3306
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0 autorelease-1086 > OPENO_VERSION
